"""
High-profile celebrity requests discreet styling services with privacy arrangements.

ROLES: user (celebrity requiring confidential salon services), assistant (salon director managing VIP and celebrity clientele)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "check_private_suite_availability",
    "description": "Check availability of private VIP salon suites.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {"date": {"type":"string","format":"date"}, "hotel_id": {"type":"string"}, "privacy_level": {"type":"string"}},
      "required": ["date","hotel_id","privacy_level"]
    },
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "get_celebrity_services",
    "description": "List exclusive celebrity styling packages.",
    "parameters": {"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties": {"hotel_id":{"type":"string"}, "service_tier": {"type":"string"}}, "required":["hotel_id","service_tier"]},
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "arrange_vip_booking",
    "description": "Coordinate confidential VIP salon appointment.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "hotel_id": {"type":"string"},
        "client_code": {"type":"string"},
        "service_package": {"type":"string"},
        "privacy_requirements": {"type":"string"},
        "preferred_time": {"type":"string"}
      },
      "required": ["hotel_id","client_code","service_package","privacy_requirements"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: The Regency Penthouse Collection (hotel_id: regency_penthouse_la)
Location: 9500 Wilshire Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90212
Timezone: America/Los_Angeles
Elite Celebrity Salon â€” Confidential Beauty Sanctuary:
  VIP Packages (codes):
    CELEBRITY_COMPLETE (full styling team, 4h), RED_CARPET_READY (event styling, 3h)
    INCOGNITO_REFRESH (discrete touch-up, 1h), PAPARAZZI_PROOF (quick styling, 90m)
  Privacy Features: Private elevator access, secured entrances, NDA-protected staff
  Celebrity Team: 8 A-list stylists with entertainment industry clearances
  Security: Soundproof private suites, tinted windows, dedicated security personnel
  Hours: 24/7 by appointment for VIP clients
  Amenities: Organic refreshments, meditation spaces, encrypted communication
  Payment: Anonymous billing, cryptocurrency accepted

user:
Hello, I need to arrange something very discreet. I'm performing at the Grammy Awards this Sunday and need a complete styling team. This must be completely confidential - no photos, no social media, and minimal staff. Can you accommodate this level of privacy?

assistant channel=analysis:
High-profile celebrity client needing maximum privacy for Grammy Awards. Check private suite availability and celebrity packages with highest security level.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_private_suite_availability:
{"date":"2025-09-07","hotel_id":"regency_penthouse_la","privacy_level":"maximum_security"}

tool.check_private_suite_availability channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"available":true,"suite":"SANCTUARY_PLATINUM","features":"private_elevator,soundproof,security_stationed","capacity":"6_stylists"}

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.get_celebrity_services:
{"hotel_id":"regency_penthouse_la","service_tier":"A_LIST"}

tool.get_celebrity_services channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"packages":[{"code":"CELEBRITY_COMPLETE","includes":"hair+makeup+wardrobe_coordination","security_level":"maximum","duration_hours":4}]}

assistant channel=analysis:
Perfect - maximum security suite available with full celebrity team. CELEBRITY_COMPLETE package ideal for Grammy preparation.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely. We specialize in A-list discretion. Our SANCTUARY_PLATINUM suite is available Sunday with private elevator access, stationed security, and a 6-person styling team under strict NDAs. The CELEBRITY_COMPLETE package includes full hair, makeup, and wardrobe coordination. Shall I arrange this under a confidential client code?

user:
Yes, perfect. Please use client code "PHOENIX_RISING" for all arrangements. I'll need the team from 10 AM to 2 PM on Sunday. Can you guarantee complete media blackout?

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.arrange_vip_booking:
{"hotel_id":"regency_penthouse_la","client_code":"PHOENIX_RISING","service_package":"CELEBRITY_COMPLETE","privacy_requirements":"complete_media_blackout,NDA_all_staff,no_photography","preferred_time":"10:00-14:00"}

tool.arrange_vip_booking channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"status":"confirmed","booking_id":"VIP_SECURED_7799","security_protocol":"ALPHA_LEVEL","team_assigned":"elite_6_cleared"}

assistant channel=analysis:
VIP booking secured with highest security protocols. Team cleared for A-list confidentiality.

assistant channel=final:
PHOENIX_RISING is secured for Sunday 10:00-14:00 (VIP_SECURED_7799). Complete media blackout confirmed - all 6 team members are entertainment-industry cleared with active NDAs. Your Grammy Awards preparation is in expert, confidential hands.

user:
Excellent. Will you be able to coordinate with my personal wardrobe stylist who will arrive separately?

assistant channel=analysis:
Client asking about coordinating with external stylist. This is a reasonable request within celebrity services scope.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely. Our team regularly coordinates with personal stylists for seamless red carpet preparation. We'll ensure secure access and perfect timing coordination for your Grammy look.

user:
The view of the Hollywood Hills from your penthouse location must be incredible for inspiration!

assistant channel=analysis:
Casual comment about the location and views. Respond positively while maintaining professional discretion.

assistant channel=final:
The creative atmosphere here is truly inspiring for our artists. The private setting helps celebrities feel relaxed and ready for their biggest moments.

user:
Do you also provide on-set hair and makeup services for my upcoming film shoot next month?

assistant channel=analysis:
Asking about mobile/on-location services which isn't specified in the salon's services. This requires ATTENTION flag.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] That's a wonderful expansion of our partnership. Reviewing available location services for your production schedule.
